dinapathama harakun dakka monaragala kandu watiye pahath bimata yana guththa pilibada gammanayema kathabahata lak wi thibini’ pahathbimata gos guththa pilibadawa soya bala ohu ha mithuruwimata anek gopae tharunayanta wadikalak gatha nowiya’ owun samaga mithuru wi harakun nidalle sitina awasthawaladi sellam kirimata guththa purudu wuyeya’ kalayak gathawethma thama mithuran samaga ekathu wi kriya kirime di thaman sathu kadisara bawata” adahaswalata ha kriyashili bawata an aya priyakala bawin thama kandayame nayakaya lesa path kara ganna ladi’ owunta da guththa nathiwama bari charithayak bawata path wiya’ owunge harak pilibada prashna” aluthisn thanabim soyayana pradesha aadiya hamu wi sakachcha kara katayuthu kirimen siyalu denagema harak ranchu ithamath hodin pahasuwen palanaya kirimata hakiyawa labuni’ gamaralata awurudda mululle wawima sadaha awashya tharam wi nomathi nisa il unduwap masawaladi kurakkan ha ala warga da kannata sidu wiya’ me gana sith thawulen pasu wu guththa nikarune gopae tharunayan samaga kandu watiya pura rawum gasima” sellam kirimata wada hondin jala ulpath athi kumbaurak aswaddimata sudusu sthanayak soya baliya’ awasanaye guththa wisin ee sadaha sudusu uldiya athi pradeshayak soyagath pasu kumbaura sakasima sadaha awashya udalu” kathi aadi aampanna gamaralagen illa sitiyeya’ ewita gamarala kiya sitiye harak ranchuwa balagena sitima wada yahapath bawayi’
